dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.catalog.ServiceCandidate
dataStructure.description:
A ServiceCandidate is an entity that makes a ServiceSpecification available to a catalog. A ServiceCandidate and its associated ServiceSpecification may be published - made visible - in any number of ServiceCatalogs, or in none. One ServiceSpecification can be composed of other ServiceSpecifications. These ServiceSpecifications may also be published.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceCandidate

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the ServiceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: iD

child.name: name
child.description:
A word or phrase that a ServiceCandidate is known and distinguished from other ServiceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains the ServiceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the ServiceCandidate is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: validFor

child.name: status
child.description:
The condition at which the ServiceCandidate exists such as planned, active and Obsolete.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: status

child.name: resourceCandidate
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceCandidateCanRefer

This association end is optional
child.label: resourceCandidate
